Traits.Name: Overdrive 4
Traits.Description: Attacks are all critical hits on hit at round 4 or later.

Traits.Name: Phasing
Traits.Description: Can ignore obstruction and pass through, but not end your turn in, terrain or characters.

Actions.Name: Chaos Shard
Actions.Hit: Character is inflicted with all four blights.
Actions.Miss: Character is inflicted with two blights of this wright's choice.
Actions.Blightboost: Character takes [D] once for every blight they are inflicted with. Roll damage once and apply it once for each blight.
